error.title: Error!
error.400_e: This error occurred because an invalid input was detected. Please make sure you have entered the required input values correctly.
error.429_e: This error occurred because many requests were coming to the server. Please try again in a moment..
error.500_e: Internal server hangs due to an unexpected cause.

login.title: Login
login.login_kkutu: Please sign in to use Rule the words! OTu Online.

kkutu.title: Rule the words! OTu Online
kkutu.meta_desc: Online Game, KKuTu, OTu, Online, Battle-off! Be the King of Words in Otu.
kkutu.websocketUnsupport:
The game is available in Internet Explorer (10), Chrome (16), Firefox (11), Opera (12.1), and Safari (6)!
Please update your browser.
kkutu.dictionarySupport: Provide advance information:National Korean Language Standard Dictionary, WordNet
kkutu.welcomeTestServer: You are connected to a test server. This server may be exploded or closed without specific notice.
kkutu.closed: Connection to the server has ended.
kkutu.error_full: Server limit number exceeded... Please connect me in a moment.!!!
kkutu.error_401:
Guest account is only for game viewing.
Try signing in by clicking the Sign In button in the top right corner!
kkutu.error_402:
Guest accounts are only accessible to the potato server
Try signing in by clicking the Sign In button in the top right corner!
kkutu.error_404: We could not find a room available. Do you create a new room?
kkutu.error_406: You can't re-enter the forced exited room.
kkutu.error_408: Connection to this account has been terminated elsewhere.
kkutu.error_411:
You can not start the game alone.
If you want to play alone, click [Exercise] or use [AI Invitation] in [Invitation].
kkutu.error_413: You must select at least one topic.
kkutu.error_414: Improper subject detected. Select a topic again.
kkutu.error_415: This type of game can not be joined by an OTu bot.
kkutu.error_416:
The room is already in the middle of a game.
Shall we enter the room and watch the game?
kkutu.error_417: The account does not exist in the lobby.
kkutu.error_419: The user has already received an invitation.
kkutu.error_421:
Profile management is available after logging in.
Press the login button in the upper right to try logging in!
kkutu.error_422: You can not invite a guest account.
kkutu.error_423:
You can use the store after you log in.
Press the login button in the upper right to try logging in!
kkutu.error_424:
The user has not reached or is not connected to this server. (If the name contains spaces, please enter them without spaces.)

User :
kkutu.error_427: The item is out of date.
kkutu.error_428: The Observer automatically leaves the room after the game.
kkutu.error_432: Room configuration is incorrect. Please reset the number of players.
kkutu.error_433: Room configuration is incorrect. Please reset the number of rounds.
kkutu.error_435: You can combine up to six character segments at a time.
kkutu.error_436: You can combine only the words that are listed in the dictionary.
kkutu.error_437: You were sent out of your room for not turning over a turn in three consecutive rounds.
kkutu.error_440: Guests, unidentified members and teenagers under 16 are restricted from midnight to 6 a.m.
kkutu.error_441: We are unable to read your date of birth. Please check if the date of birth of the logged in account is available and then try logging in again in OTu. You can hide your date of birth information when you are finished.
kkutu.error_442: Connection to the server ended because there was no response for more than 5 minutes.
kkutu.error_443: Chat access to this account has been restricted by your administrator.
kkutu.error_444:
Your account has been restricted by your administrator.
Reasons for limitation:
kkutu.error_445: Your confirmation was successful. Thank you for using OTu.
kkutu.error_450: The user is not connected to OTu or is not connected to this server.
kkutu.error_451:
Community functions are available after logging in.
Press the login button in the upper right to try logging in!
kkutu.error_452: You can not add any more friends.
kkutu.error_453: You can not add your account as a friend.
kkutu.error_454: Waiting for a response to your request to add friends.
kkutu.error_455: Only friends who are not connected can be deleted.
kkutu.error_500: Server check or update in progress.
kkutu.checkAgeAsk:
In Otu, we are entering the date of birth for identification. The entered date of birth is for identification and internal processing only and is not open to third parties.
Do you proceed with the identification?
kkutu.checkAgeNo: The input value is invalid. Please check again.
kkutu.checkAgeInput2: Please enter the month of your birth date. (1 to 12)
kkutu.checkAgeSure: Is the date of birth entered below correct? The date of birth entered is used only for identification and internal information processing and is not disclosed to third parties.
kkutu.checkAgeCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your confirmation?
kkutu.sureHandover: Are you sure you're taking over the room??
kkutu.linkWarning: You clicked on the link. This service is not responsible for any damages caused by moving the link. Continue?
kkutu.trollWarning: Failed to pass two consecutive turns. A third failure to turn over will result in leaving the room.
kkutu.modex0:
끝 두/세 자리로 시작하는 영어 어휘로 잇습니다.
apple → please → secret
kkutu.modex1:
끝 한 자리로 시작하는 영어 어휘로 잇습니다.
apple → elephant → time
kkutu.modex2:
끝 한 자리로 시작하는 세 글자의 한국어 어휘로 잇습니다.
강아지 → 지렁이 → 이발소
kkutu.modex3:
끝 한 자리로 시작하는 한국어 어휘로 잇습니다.
그물 → 물레방아 → 아저씨
kkutu.modex4: 주어진 주제와 초성만 가지고 어떤 단어인지 유추합니다.
kkutu.modex5: 십자 모양의 빈 칸에 들어갈 알맞은 한국어 단어를 유추합니다.
kkutu.modex6: 주어진 한국어 단어를 최대한 빠르게 입력합니다.
kkutu.modex7: 주어진 영어 단어를 최대한 빠르게 입력합니다.
kkutu.modex8:
앞 한 자리로 끝나는 한국어 어휘로 잇습니다.
고구마 → 이실직고 → 맏이
kkutu.modex9: 주어진 초성에 맞는 한국어 어휘를 댑니다.
kkutu.modex10: 주어진 주제에 맞는 한국어 어휘를 댑니다.
kkutu.modex11: 주어진 주제에 맞는 영어 어휘를 댑니다.
kkutu.modex12: 무작위로 섞인 글자들 속에서 한국어 단어를 솎아 냅니다.
kkutu.modex13: 무작위로 섞인 글자들 속에서 영어 단어를 솎아 냅니다.
kkutu.modex14: 한글로 된 2자 ~ 10자의 단어를 그림으로 설명하고 맞춥니다. 경고: 모바일은 정상플레이 불가
kkutu.modex15: 영어로 된 4자 ~ 16자의 단어를 그림으로 설명하고 맞춥니다. 경고: 모바일은 정상플레이 불가
kkutu.subJamsu: All players have prepared. If you do not start the game within 30 seconds, you will automatically leave the room.
kkutu.masterJamsu: All players were ready, but they left the room because they did not start the game.
kkutu.soon: The game will start in a few minutes!
kkutu.explManner: Don't let me use First turn kill word.
kkutu.explInjeong: Accept the use of special words.
kkutu.explMission: You will get an additional score by following the words that contain certain characters.
kkutu.explProverb: One sentence appears on the screen instead of the word.
kkutu.explStrict: You can enter only noun words except dialects, old words, and North Korean words.
kkutu.explSami: It alternates between three letter words and two letter words.
kkutu.explNo2: Prevents the use of two-letter words.
kkutu.explUnlimited: Adjust the length of the word in the picturequiz to infinity.
kkutu.explInjPick: Choose a topic for your game.
kkutu.theme_OIM: my little sister Can not Be Cute like this
kkutu.kickVoteNotice: If you don't participate in the time limit, system will automatically mark it as Agree.
kkutu.kickVoteText: 's kick vote has been started. Do you agree?
kkutu.invited: (Room Number) Room sent an invitation. Enter?
kkutu.guestExit: Please login to have more fun!
kkutu.sureConsume: Are you sure to use this?
kkutu.sureEquip: Are you sure you want to equip:
kkutu.sureUnequip: Are you sure you want to unequip:
kkutu.dressWhichHand: Which hand will you dress? ( OK: Left / Cancel: Right )
kkutu.cfTray: Make a word using word pieces!
kkutu.cfBlend: You can combine 3 letters which has no meaning. It will make a new letter.
kkutu.cfSureCompose: Are you sure? Word letters used will be destroyed!
kkutu.hasExpired: item has expired, and is now destroyed.
kkutu.cmd_f: (/f) Show a chat log with 100 messages recieved/sended recently.
kkutu.cmd_ee: (/ee Message) Send a private message(DM) to a person you whispered most recently.
kkutu.cmd_wb: (/wb To...) Blacklist selected player's DM. Send again to cancel.
kkutu.cmd_shut: (/shut To...) Blacklist selected player's message. Send again to cancel.
kkutu.cmd_id: (/id To...) Find the ID of a player you selected.
kkutu.sureInvite: Are you sure to invite this player?
kkutu.onlyUnlock: See only rooms with no password
kkutu.attemptFriendAdd: attempted you to be a friend. Accept?
kkutu.friendEditMemo: Edit a memo of this frined. (Maximum 50 Characters)
kkutu.friendAddNotice:
Input the ID of the player you want to be friends with. 
You can get ID by typing /id <player>
kkutu.friendSureRemove: Are you sure to remove this friend?
kkutu.quickStatus: Amount of Room(s) with selected configuration:
kkutu.dying: Error has occured on this channel. This channel will be closed in 10 seconds. Sorry for the inconvenience.
kkutu.blocked: Spam Detected! For a short time, you will not be able to send messages.
kkutu.paybackHelp: Select items to sell clicking the item while pressing Ctrl.
kkutu.surePayback: Are you sure to sell this item in:
kkutu.moremiAfter: Moremi after you equip this item
kkutu.alreadyGot: You already own this item.
kkutu.surePurchase: Are you sure to buy this item?
kkutu.purchased: Purchased! Check it in your inventory.
kkutu.okgExpl:
You can earn more XP
by playing 10 mins or more, which is !
Every 10 mins, it will be more powerful.
kkutu.okgNotice: You earned Gameplay Buff by playing 10 mins or more!
kkutu.okgExpired: Day had passed, and your Gameplay Buff is expired.
kkutu.replayError: This file is not KKuTu replay file.
kkutu.wpDesc1: Enter a word you want to add.
kkutu.wpDesc2: After word is added, you will get small amount of XP!
kkutu.wpFail_401: Error! The word is not a noun!
kkutu.wpFail_402: Error! Login to request a word.
kkutu.wpFail_403: Error! This word is already requested.
kkutu.wpFail_404: Error! This word is not valid.
kkutu.wpFail_405: Error! This word is not in the wiki.
kkutu.wpFail_406: Error! This word doesn't obey the request standard!

game/fates.title: 카드 뽑기
game/fates.fcRule1: 제한된 시간 안에 W키를 눌러 목표 카드와 색을 맞추세요! 기회는 단 한 번입니다!

game/fates.title: 카드 뽑기
game/fates.fcRule1: 제한된 시간 안에 W키를 눌러 목표 카드와 색을 맞추세요! 기회는 단 한 번입니다!
